name: This is Us (2020)
description:
Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020 - theme: Repair.

A podcast with interactive elements. Explores the question: what do we want to give?

The three of us brought to the conversation some tokens of meaning to us. These tokens can be examined in the game.

If you would rather simply listen to the podcast alongside the game's visuals, you can do so here.

Credits

  • Adam Thompson
  • Alexey Botkov
  • Marc Loths
